modShortDescription: Slickster43 took a vanilla RWG 4K map and modified the list of POIs and Spawn Points. The map now contains 10 traders. There are towns in every biome type.
modDescription:
Navezgane is great, but it gets boring after a while. Random World Generator (RWG) [maps](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-maps/) are hit or miss, but are often miss with too little of certain biomes, too few of the high-quality buildings, and towns located too heavily or sparsely in each biome.

Slickster43 took a vanilla RWG 4K map ([KeyedDops](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19792-alpha-19-seed-thread/)) and modified the list of POIs and Spawn Points. The map now contains 10 traders, including one in every town or city, and at least one of every high-value POI (stores, skyscrapers, army camps, etc). There are towns in every biome type. This map is being used on servers, such as the Dire Moon Gaming private server.

**To add this to your game:**

1. Open a new File Manager window and type %appdata%
2. Double-click the 7 Days to Die folder
3. Double-click the GeneratedWorlds folder  
If you do not have this folder, right-click, select New â€“> Folder and title it GeneratedWorlds
4. Download the below .zip file for the map
5. In your Downloads folder, select the file, right-click it, select Extract All into the above Generated Worlds folder
6. Launch 7 Days to Die
7. After choosing New Game, cycle the Game World to East Tauwi County and finish setting up your game.
8. Enjoy!

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/16wLOcnmDTFSQTG7Fe2XWdJXo920dPedp/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** Slickster43 Gaming, dcsobral simulated maps
